content.original: Use this Ability to Perform an Attack against the Ground. Left Alt + Click on friendly to target Friendly Units.
content.prevOriginal: Use this Ability to Perform an Attack against the Ground. Left Alt + Click on friendly to target Friendly Units.
content.content: 使用能力攻击地面. LALT + 点击友军来瞄准友军单位.

content.original: ATTACK GROUND

content.original: ACTION: Fire weapons at up to three separate targets within this 'Mech's current firing arc.
content.prevOriginal: ACTION: Fire weapons at up to three separate targets within this 'Mech's current firing arc.
content.content: 行动: 在机甲当前的射击范围内,向最多三个独立的目标开火.
